https://pokemontcg.io/: The main function of this website is to provide access to the Pokémon TCG API, which allows developers to access comprehensive card data, including prices, hi-res images, and detailed search queries, in order to build applications. It also includes a developer portal for managing accounts and API keys.
https://dev.pokemontcg.io/: The main function of this website is to provide a developer portal for building applications using the Pokémon TCG API.
https://pokeapi.co/: The main function of this website is to provide a RESTful API with comprehensive information about the Pokémon main game series, accessible through documentation without any extensive setup process required.
